doc:
Robert Hooks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Hooks 0 Robert Hooks (born Bobby Dean Hooks, April 18, 1937) is an African-American actor, producer, and activist. He is most recognizable to the public for his over 100 roles in films, television, and stage. Hooks has been regarded, variously, as a gifted artist who broke the color barriers in stage, film and television before the term "colorblind casting" even existed, and a leading man when there were no African American matinee idols. Robert_Hooks ( born Bobby_Dean_Hooks , April_18_,_1937 ) is an_African-American_actor , producer , and activist . He is most_recognizable to the_public for his_over_100_roles in films , television , and stage . Hooks has_been_regarded , variously , as a_gifted_artist who broke the_color_barriers in stage_,_film_and_television before the_term " colorblind_casting " even existed , and a_leading_man when there were no_African_American_matinee_idols .
